channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Creative Cloud Desktop Application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Creative Cloud Desktop Application

item.title: CVE-2019-8063|2024-08-04T21:10:32.593Z -- adobe -- creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Creative Cloud Desktop Application 4.6.1 and earlier versions have an insecure transmission of sensitive data vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information leakage.

item.title: CVE-2019-7957|2024-08-04T21:02:19.418Z -- adobe -- creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Creative Cloud Desktop Application versions 4.6.1 and earlier have a security bypass vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2019-7958|2024-08-04T21:02:19.407Z -- adobe -- creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Creative Cloud Desktop Application versions 4.6.1 and earlier have an insecure inherited permissions vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2019-7959|2024-08-04T21:02:19.375Z -- adobe -- creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Creative Cloud Desktop Application versions 4.6.1 and earlier have a using components with known vulnerabilities vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-3808|2024-08-04T07:44:50.880Z -- adobe -- creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application
item.description: Creative Cloud Desktop Application versions 5.0 and earlier have a time-of-check to time-of-use (toctou) race condition vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary file deletion.
